adminGuide.title: Nduzi Onye Nchịkwa
adminGuide.description: Nduzi zuru oke maka ndị nchịkwa ikpo okwu. Mụta otu esi ejikwa ndị ọrụ, nyochaa nyocha, na hazie ntọala sistemụ.
adminGuide.feature1: Nchịkọta na Nyocha nke Ikpo Okwu
adminGuide.feature2: Njikwa Onye Ọrụ na Ụlọ Ọrụ
adminGuide.feature3: Akụkọ Ego na Ego E Si Enweta

enterpriseGuide.title: Nduzi Azụmaahịa
enterpriseGuide.description: Nduzi maka ndị nchịkwa ụlọ ọrụ. Mụta ijikwa otu gị, ịtọ ntọala ihe ọmụma, na ijikwa nkwenye ọdịnaya.
enterpriseGuide.feature1: Njikwa na Ịkpọ òkù Ndị otu

userGuide.title: Ntuziaka Onye Ọrụ
userGuide.description: Ihe niile ịchọrọ iji mepụta, nyochaa, ma bipụta ọdịnaya. Zuru oke maka ndị na-emepụta ọdịnaya na ndị na-ere ahịa.

overview.intro: Dịka onye nchịkwa ikpo okwu, ị nwere ike ịnweta ngwaọrụ zuru oke maka inyocha na ijikwa ikpo okwu Contentry niile. Nduzi a ga-enyere gị aka ịghọta ikike nchịkwa gị.
overview.dashboardDesc: Dashboard Admin na-enye echiche zuru oke gbasara ọrụ ikpo okwu na ahụike.
overview.feature4: Nweta ngwa ngwa na ọrụ nchịkwa dị mkpa
overview.tip: Gaa na Dashboard Admin mgbe niile iji mara ihe gbasara usoro ikpo okwu ma chọpụta nsogbu ndị nwere ike ime n'oge.

userManagement.intro: Njikwa onye ọrụ bụ ọrụ nchịkwa bụ isi nke na-enye gị ohere ijikwa ndị ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ niile dị na ikpo okwu ahụ.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Nweta ngalaba Njikwa Onye Ọrụ iji lee, chọọ, na jikwaa ndị ọrụ ikpo okwu niile.
userManagement.feature1: Chọọ ma yochaa ndị ọrụ site na aha, email, ma ọ bụ ọrụ ha
userManagement.feature2: Lee profaịlụ onye ọrụ zuru ezu na akụkọ ihe mere eme ọrụ
userManagement.feature3: Gbanwee ọrụ na ikike ndị ọrụ
userManagement.feature4: Gbanyụọ ma ọ bụ hichapụ akaụntụ ndị ọrụ mgbe ọ dị mkpa
userManagement.rolesDesc: Contentry nwere ọrụ atọ bụ isi nke onye ọrụ:
userManagement.role1: Onye nchịkwa: Ohere zuru oke maka ikpo okwu yana ikike nhazi sistemụ
userManagement.role2: Onye Nchịkwa Ụlọ Ọrụ: Na-achịkwa otu na ntọala ụlọ ọrụ ha
userManagement.role3: Onye ọrụ: Atụmatụ imepụta ọdịnaya na nyocha ọkọlọtọ
userManagement.warning: Na-enyocha mmetụta ahụ mgbe niile tupu ịgbanwe ọrụ ndị ọrụ ma ọ bụ ihichapụ akaụntụ. Ihe ndị a nwere ike imetụta usoro ọrụ otu.

analytics.intro: Nchịkọta na-enye nghọta miri emi banyere otu esi eji ikpo okwu ahụ n'ofe ụlọ ọrụ na ndị ọrụ niile.
analytics.metric1: Ndị ọrụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na usoro uto
analytics.metric3: Ọnụego njikọ aka n'elu ikpo okwu
analytics.metric5: Nrubeisi na akara ihe egwu n'ofe ụlọ ọrụ
analytics.tip: Mbupụ akụkọ nyocha maka ihe ngosi ndị metụtara ya site na iji atụmatụ Akụkọ Nbudata.

financials.intro: Ngalaba Nchịkọta Ego na-enye nghọta n'ime ego na usoro ndebanye aha.
financials.revenueDesc: Nyochaa ahụike ego na usoro ndenye aha n'ofe ụlọ ọrụ niile.
financials.feature1: Nchịkọta ego na-agbanwe agbanwe kwa ọnwa (MRR)
financials.feature3: Ojiji kredit na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ịzụrụ ihe

systemConfig.intro: Nhazi sistemụ na-enye gị ohere ijikwa ntọala na njikọta n'ofe ikpo okwu.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Hazie ma nyochaa njikọta ndị ọzọ:
systemConfig.integration1: API Ayrshare maka mbipụta mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta
systemConfig.integration2: Ọrụ AI maka mmepụta na nyocha ọdịnaya
systemConfig.integration3: Nhazi ịkwụ ụgwọ site na Stripe
systemConfig.tip: Na-anwale njikọta mgbe niile n'ebe a na-eme ihe ngosi tupu ị gbanwee ntọala mmepụta.

gettingStarted.intro: Nnọọ na Contentry! Dịka onye nchịkwa azụmaahịa, ị nwere ngwaọrụ iji jikwaa otu gị, guzobe ntuziaka ọdịnaya, ma hụ na akara ngwaahịa ahụ na-aga n'ihu.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Soro usoro ndị a iji melite akaụntụ azụmaahịa gị:
gettingStarted.step1: Gaa na Ntọala > Enterprise iji nweta dashboard ụlọ ọrụ gị
gettingStarted.step2: Bulite ntuziaka na amụma akara ụlọ ọrụ gị na Ebe Ihe Ọmụma
gettingStarted.step3: Kpọọ ndị otu gị ma nye ọrụ kwesịrị ekwesị
gettingStarted.step4: Hazie usoro nkwado maka nyocha ọdịnaya
gettingStarted.tip: Mezue ntọala ihe ọmụma gị tupu ị kpọọ ndị otu gị ka ha hụ na ha nwere ike ịnweta ntuziaka ngwaahịa site na ụbọchị mbụ.

teamManagement.intro: Njikwa otu dị irè na-eme ka mmekorita dị mfe na njikwa ohere dị mma n'ime ụlọ ọrụ gị.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Tinye ndị otu ọhụrụ na otu azụmaahịa gị:
teamManagement.feature1: Tinye adreesị ozi-e nke onye otu ahụ
teamManagement.feature2: Họrọ ọrụ ha (Onye Okike, Onye njikwa, ma ọ bụ Onye nchịkwa)
teamManagement.feature3: Tinye ozi nkeonwe nhọrọ na òkù ahụ
teamManagement.rolesDesc: Kenye ọrụ dabere na ibu ọrụ:
teamManagement.role1: Onye Okike: Nwere ike ịmepụta ma nyefee ọdịnaya maka nkwenye
teamManagement.role2: Onye njikwa: Nwere ike ịkwado/jụ ọdịnaya ma jikwaa ndị okike
teamManagement.role3: Onye nchịkwa: Nweta ohere azụmaahịa zuru oke gụnyere ịkwụ ụgwọ na ntọala
teamManagement.tip: Akwụkwọ ịkpọ òkù ga-agwụ mgbe ụbọchị asaa gachara. Chetara ndị otu ka ha nabata akwụkwọ ịkpọ òkù ha ozugbo.

knowledgeBase.intro: Ebe Ihe Ọmụma bụ ebe nchekwa isi ụlọ ọrụ gị maka ntuziaka ngwaahịa, iwu, na iwu ọdịnaya. Akwụkwọ ndị e tinyere ebe a na-akọwa ọdịnaya sitere na AI maka ndị otu niile.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Tinye akwụkwọ ndị ga-eduzi imepụta ọdịnaya:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Ntuziaka ụdị akara na ntuziaka olu
knowledgeBase.docType3: Ntuziaka maka ibipụta mgbasa ozi ọha na eze
knowledgeBase.docType4: Iwu ndị a kapịrị ọnụ maka ụlọ ọrụ
knowledgeBase.tip: Bulite ntuziaka akara gị kacha mkpa. AI na-ebute akwụkwọ dị na ebe a na-ahụ maka ihe ọmụma ụlọ ọrụ ụzọ karịa ibugote onye ọrụ nke ọ bụla.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Usoro nkwado ahụ na-eme ka ọdịnaya niile mezuo ụkpụrụ ụlọ ọrụ gị tupu ebipụta ya.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Ọdịnaya na-agafe n'ime usoro ndị a:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Onye Okike na-emepụta ma ọ bụ na-enyocha ọdịnaya
approvalWorkflow.step2: A na-eziga ọdịnaya maka nkwenye (ọ bụrụ na achọrọ ya)
approvalWorkflow.step3: Nyocha nke onye njikwa ma nye nzaghachi
approvalWorkflow.step4: Enwere ike ibipụta ọdịnaya akwadoro na nyiwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
approvalWorkflow.warning: Mee ka ihe achọrọ maka nkwenye dị na Ntọala iji hụ na enyochala ọdịnaya niile tupu ebipụta ya.

billing.intro: Jikwaa ndenye aha ụlọ ọrụ gị ma nyochaa ojiji kredit.
billing.feature1: Nkọwa atụmatụ dị ugbu a na nkesa kredit
billing.feature2: Akụkọ ojiji na kredit ndị fọdụrụnụ
billing.feature3: Akụkọ akwụkwọ ọnụahịa na ụzọ ịkwụ ụgwọ

deleteModal.title: Hichapụ onye ọrụ
deleteModal.description: Nke a ga-ehichapụ onye ọrụ ahụ na data niile metụtara ya kpamkpam:

gettingStarted.intro: Nnọọ na Contentry! Nduzi a ga-enyere gị aka ịmepụta ọdịnaya na-adọrọ adọrọ ma na-agbaso iwu site na iji ngwaọrụ ndị na-akwado AI.
gettingStarted.step1: Hazie profaịlụ gị na ozi ziri ezi
gettingStarted.step2: Jikọọ akaụntụ mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta gị
gettingStarted.step3: Mepụta Profaịlụ Atụmatụ maka akara ma ọ bụ mkpọsa gị
gettingStarted.tip: Malite na Profaịlụ Atụmatụ iji hụ na ọdịnaya gị niile na-anọgide na-enwe ụda na ozi na-aga n'ihu.

contentCreation.intro: Mmepụta ọdịnaya nke Contentry na-akwado site na AI na-enyere gị aka ịmepụta posts na-adọrọ mmasị n'ime sekọnd.
contentCreation.generateDesc: Mepụta ọdịnaya site na iji AI:
contentCreation.feature1: Tinye isiokwu ma ọ bụ ndụmọdụ na-akọwa ihe ịchọrọ itinye gbasara ya
contentCreation.feature2: Họrọ nyiwe ebumnuche gị (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, wdg)
contentCreation.feature3: Họrọ ụda ide ihe kachasị amasị gị
contentCreation.feature4: Mepụta onyonyo dị na ya ma ọ bụrụ na ịchọrọ.
contentCreation.schedule1: Tọọ usoro nhazi ọdịnaya ugboro ugboro
contentCreation.schedule2: Họrọ ụbọchị na oge kpọmkwem maka izipu ozi na akpaghị aka
contentCreation.schedule3: Mee ka mbipụta akpaaka ma ọ bụ nyocha aka rụọ ọrụ tupu ebipụta ya
contentCreation.tip: Jiri igbe 'Ọdịnaya Nkwalite' mgbe ị na-emepụta ozi ahịa iji hụ na nyocha nrubeisi tụlere ntuziaka nkwalite.

analyzeContent.intro: Atụmatụ Nyocha Ọdịnaya na-enyocha ọdịnaya gị maka nnabata, mmetụta omenala, na nhazi akara.
analyzeContent.step1: Gaa na Nhazi Ọdịnaya > Nyochaa Ọdịnaya
analyzeContent.step2: Mado ọdịnaya gị n'ime mpaghara ederede
analyzeContent.step3: Họrọ Profaịlụ Atụmatụ maka ihe gbara ya gburugburu
analyzeContent.step4: Pịa Nyochaa iji nweta nzaghachi zuru ezu
analyzeContent.type1: Nrubeisi na atumatu na ntuziaka ụlọ ọrụ
analyzeContent.type2: Mmetụta omenala n'ofe mpaghara dị iche iche
analyzeContent.type3: Olu akara na nguzosi ike nke ụda
analyzeContent.type4: Ihe egwu na ndụmọdụ ndị nwere ike ime
analyzeContent.tip: Na-enyocha ọdịnaya mgbe niile tupu ebipụta ya na nyiwe mpụga, ọkachasị maka mkpọsa na-elekwasị anya na ọtụtụ mpaghara.

strategicProfiles.intro: Profaịlụ Atụmatụ na-akọwapụta ihe dị n'ime ya, ụda olu ya, na ntuziaka maka imepụta na nyocha ọdịnaya.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Kọwaa ihe ndị na-ege ntị na ebumnuche nke profaịlụ ahụ
strategicProfiles.feature2: Debe ihe gbasara omenala na mpaghara
strategicProfiles.feature3: Bulite akwụkwọ na ntuziaka kpọmkwem maka profaịlụ
strategicProfiles.feature4: Hazie ụda ndabara na mmasị ụdị
strategicProfiles.tip: Mepụta Profaịlụ Atụmatụ dị iche iche maka mkpọsa dị iche iche, ụdị, ma ọ bụ ahịa mpaghara.

socialAccounts.intro: Jikọọ akaụntụ mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta gị iji bipụta ọdịnaya ozugbo site na Contentry.
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Peeji nkeonwe na ụlọ ọrụ
socialAccounts.warning: Mee ka njikọ akaụntụ mmekọrịta gị dị ọhụrụ. Ihe nrịbama ndị agwụla nwere ike igbochi mbipụta nke ozi akwadoro.

approvalProcess.intro: Ọ bụrụ na ụlọ ọrụ gị nwere usoro nkwado, a ga-enyocha ọdịnaya tupu ebipụta ya.
approvalProcess.step1: Mepụta ma ọ bụ nyochaa ọdịnaya gị
approvalProcess.step2: Pịa 'Nyefee maka nkwenye' iji ziga onye njikwa gị
approvalProcess.step3: Sochie ọnọdụ nkwado n'ahịrị Nkwado Na-echere
approvalProcess.tip: Tinye ihe ndetu mgbe ị na-enyefe ọdịnaya iji nye ndị nyocha ihe gbasara mkpebi okike gị.

aboutGuide.title: Banyere & Omume Kachasị Mma
aboutGuide.description: Mụta ihe Contentry bụ maka ya ma chọpụta usoro kachasị mma iji melite mmepụta ọdịnaya gị, nkwekọrịta akara, na profaịlụ ndị na-emetụta mmetụta gị.

sections.optimizeContent: Mee ka Ọdịnaya Gị Ka Mma

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry bụ ikpo okwu ọgụgụ isi ọdịnaya nke AI na-akwado iji nyere ndị na-emepụta ọdịnaya, ndị na-ere ahịa, na ụlọ ọrụ aka ịmepụta, nyochaa, ma bipụta ọdịnaya kwekọrọ na ya n'ọtụtụ. Ma ị bụ onye na-emetụta ihe ma ọ bụ akụkụ nke nnukwu otu ahịa, Contentry na-eme ka usoro ọrụ ọdịnaya gị dị mfe.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Anyị kwenyere n'inye ndị okike ike site na iji ngwaọrụ nwere ọgụgụ isi nke na-eme ka ihe ọ bụla dị na ya, na-emetụta omenala, ma na-agbaso ntuziaka ikpo okwu.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Mmepụta ọdịnaya nke AI kwadoro nke dabara na olu akara gị
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Nyocha nnabata n'oge kwesịrị ekwesị maka ihe achọrọ maka iwu
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Nyocha mmetụta omenala maka ndị na-ege ntị n'ụwa niile
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Usoro nkwado dị mfe maka ndị otu ụlọ ọrụ
whatIsContentry.tip: Contentry na-ejikọta ike nke AI na nlekọta mmadụ iji nye ọdịnaya nke na-adabara ndị na-ege gị ntị ma na-agbaso iwu.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry na-enye usoro ngwaọrụ zuru oke iji jikwaa usoro ndụ ọdịnaya gị niile:
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Mepụta ọdịnaya dị elu nke dabara na akara gị na ndị na-ege gị ntị:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Mmepụta ọdịnaya n'ọtụtụ ikpo okwu (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: A pụrụ ịhazi ụda ederede (Ọkachamara, Nkịtị, Mkpali)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: Nhazi onyonyo AI iji soro posts gị
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Hụ na ọdịnaya gị mezuru ihe niile achọrọ tupu ebipụta ya:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Nyocha nnabata akpaghị aka megide iwu ụlọ ọrụ
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Akara mmetụta omenala maka ndị na-ege ntị mba ụwa
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Nyocha ihe egwu site na ndụmọdụ ndị a ga-eme
keyFeatures.tip: Jiri Profaịlụ Atụmatụ iji hụ na olu akara ngosi na-agbanwe agbanwe n'ofe ọdịnaya niile emepụtara.

bestPractices.intro: Ịgbaso usoro kachasị mma ndị a ga-enyere gị aka irite uru kachasị na Contentry ma mepụta ọdịnaya na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma:
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Usoro ọrụ na-aga n'ihu na-eme ka mma na arụmọrụ dị mma:
bestPractices.workflow1: Malite site n'ịtọlite Profaịlụ Atụmatụ gị site na iji ntuziaka akara
bestPractices.workflow2: Mepụta ọdịnaya dabere na ikpo okwu na ndị na-ege ntị kpọmkwem n'uche
bestPractices.workflow3: Na-enyocha ọdịnaya mgbe niile tupu ebipụta ya na nyiwe mpụga
bestPractices.workflow4: Jiri atụmatụ nhazi oge iji nọgide na-enwe nhazi ọkwa mgbe niile
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Ịmepụta akara ngosi na-aga n'ihu na-ewulite ntụkwasị obi na nnabata:
bestPractices.consistency1: Bulite ntuziaka ụdị akara gị na Isi Ihe Ọmụma
bestPractices.consistency2: Jiri otu Profaịlụ Atụmatụ ahụ maka mkpọsa ndị metụtara ya
bestPractices.consistency3: Nyochaa ọdịnaya AI mepụtara iji hụ na ọ dabara na olu gị
bestPractices.warning: Na-enyocha ọdịnaya ndị AI mepụtara mgbe niile tupu ebipụta ya. Ọ bụ ezie na AI anyị dị ike, nlekọta mmadụ na-eme ka nsonaazụ kacha mma pụta ìhè.

optimizeContent.intro: Ịmepụta ọdịnaya dị mma bụ naanị mmalite. Lee otu esi eme ka mmekọrịta gị dịkwuo mma:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Ikpo okwu ọ bụla nwere ihe pụrụ iche achọrọ na atụmanya ndị na-ege ntị:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Lekwasị anya na nghọta ọkachamara, jiri okwu ụlọ ọrụ, ogologo oge a na-anabata
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Ozi dị nkenke, jiri hashtags mee ihe n'ụzọ dị mfe, soro isiokwu ndị na-ewu ewu na-akpakọrịta.
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Ihe onyonyo na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma, na-agba ndị obodo ume itinye aka na ya
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Ihe onyonyo dị elu dị mkpa, jiri hashtags dị mkpa, Akụkọ maka itinye aka
optimizeContent.engagement1: Biputere ozi mgbe niile n'oge kacha mma maka ndị na-ege gị ntị
optimizeContent.engagement2: Jiri oku na-adọrọ adọrọ mee ihe n'ime ọdịnaya gị
optimizeContent.engagement3: Zaghachi okwu gị ma soro obodo gị kparịta ụka
optimizeContent.engagement4: Soro nyocha iji ghọta ihe ọdịnaya kacha arụ ọrụ
optimizeContent.tip: Jiri atụmatụ nhazi Contentry mee ihe iji biputere n'oge kacha mma na-enweghị mgbalị aka.

brandDeals.intro: Mmekọrịta nke ika nwere ike ịbụ nnukwu ụzọ isi nweta ego. Lee otu esi eme ka ụzọ gị ka mma:
brandDeals.prep1: Nọgide na-enwe ọrụ ọkachamara na nke na-agbanwe agbanwe na ọdịnaya
brandDeals.prep2: Soro ma gosipụta usoro njikọ aka gị
brandDeals.prep3: Wuo ngwa mgbasa ozi site na iji ndị mmadụ gị ma ruo ha aka
brandDeals.prep4: Jiri Contentry mepụta echiche ọdịnaya akara ngosi ihe atụ
brandDeals.pitchingDesc: Mee ka okwu gị pụta ìhè:
brandDeals.pitch1: Hazie echiche gị na ụkpụrụ nke akara ahụ na ndị na-ege ntị lekwasịrị anya.
brandDeals.pitch2: Nye echiche ọdịnaya kpọmkwem kama ịtụ aro izugbe
brandDeals.pitch3: Tinye nyocha nrubeisi iji gosi na ọdịnaya gị na-agbaso ntuziaka
brandDeals.tip: Jiri nlele nrubeisi nke Contentry mgbe ị na-emepụta ọdịnaya akwadoro iji hụ na emezuola ihe achọrọ maka mkpughe FTC na ikpo okwu.

influencerProfiles.intro: Profaịlụ Atụmatụ Gị bụ ntọala nke atụmatụ ọdịnaya gị. Lee otu esi eme ka ọ ka mma:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Profaịlụ ahaziri nke ọma na-eme ka ọdịnaya dị n'ime akara ahụ na-agbanwe agbanwe:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Kọwaa niche gị ma lekwasị anya nke ọma na ndị na-ege ntị
influencerProfiles.setup2: Tọọ ụda na ụdị ederede kachasị amasị gị
influencerProfiles.setup3: Tinye ihe gbasara omenala na mpaghara maka ndị na-ege gị ntị
influencerProfiles.setup4: Bulite akwụkwọ ntụaka ndị na-akọwa olu akara gị
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Na-emeziwanye profaịlụ gị mgbe niile maka nsonaazụ ka mma:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Nyochaa ọdịnaya emepụtara ma gbanwee ntọala profaịlụ dịka ọ dị mkpa
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Mepụta ọtụtụ profaịlụ maka mkpọsa ma ọ bụ ndị na-ege ntị dị iche iche
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Mee ka ihe ọmụma gị dị ọhụrụ site na iji ntuziaka akara kachasị ọhụrụ
influencerProfiles.tip: Nyochaa Profaịlụ Atụmatụ gị kwa ọnwa atọ iji hụ na ọ na-egosipụta akara na ndị na-ege gị ntị na-agbanwe agbanwe.

workflowsGuide.title: Usoro Ọrụ na Nduzi Akara
workflowsGuide.description: Mụta otu usoro akara si arụ ọrụ ma ghọta usoro ọrụ ọ bụla site na nyocha ọdịnaya ruo na nkwenye.

scoring.intro: Sistemụ akara dị na Contentry na-enye akara doro anya, dabere na ntaramahụhụ iji nyere gị aka ịghọta otu ọdịnaya gị si arụ ọrụ. Akara niile na-amalite na 100 ma a na-ewepụ akara maka mmebi iwu ma ọ bụ nsogbu ndị achọtara.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Akara ahụ bụ ngwakọta dị arọ nke ihe nyocha niile, site na 0 ruo 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Ọ dị mma - Dị njikere ibipụta, ọdịnaya ka mma nke ukwuu
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Ọ dị mma - A na-atụ aro obere mmezi tupu ebipụta ya
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Ọ dị mkpa ka a lebara anya - Nyocha na mgbanwe dị mkpa
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: E gosipụtara akara - Nsogbu ndị dị mkpa, ebipụtala ya ruo mgbe edoziri ya
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Akara ahụ dum na-eji ibu nhagharị dabere na ọkwa ihe egwu:
scoring.overallCalc4: Ihe Ize Ndụ Dị Oke Mkpa (Nrubeisi ≤40): Akara niile a kapịrị ọnụ na oke kachasị 40
scoring.componentsDesc: A na-agbakọ akara gị niile site na ihe atọ dị mkpa site na iji usoro dabere na ntaramahụhụ:
scoring.component1: Akara Nrubeisi: Malite na 100, na-ewepụ isi ihe maka mmebi iwu ọ bụla achọtara
scoring.component2: Akara Mmetụta Omenala: Nkezi nke akụkụ omenala isii nke Hofstede
scoring.component3: Akara Izizi: Malite na 100, na-ewepụ isi ihe maka ezighi ezi ma ọ bụ nsogbu achọtara
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Ozi ọ bụla na-amalite site na Akara Nrubeisi nke 100. A na-ewepụ isi ihe maka mmebi iwu ọ bụla:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Mmebi Iwu Dị Oke Mkpa (-60 pts): Mmebi Iwu NDA, ikpughe ozi nzuzo → Ihe egwu nkwụsị ozugbo
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Mmebi Iwu Dị Oke (-40 pts): Mmegbu, ịkpa ókè, okwu ịkpọasị → Ihe egwu ikpe iwu
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Mmebi Iwu Dị Elu (-25 pts): Mkpughe mgbasa ozi efu, mmebi iwu → Ntara/ihe egwu nkwụsịtụ
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Mmebi Iwu Dị Oke (-10 pts): Ụda na-ekwesịghị ekwesị, obere mgbanwe ntuziaka → Ọzụzụ/ịdọ aka ná ntị
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Ihe atụ: Enweghị #ad (-25) + Mbipụta ụda (-10) = Akara ikpeazụ nke 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Ọtụtụ mmebi iwu - a na-etinye ntaramahụhụ ọ bụla n'otu n'otu
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Mmebi iwu elelere anya: Ozi nzuzo, Mmekpa ahụ, mmebi iwu NDA, Mkpughe efu, Mmebi iwu, olu na-ekwesịghị ekwesị
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Akara omenala bụ nkezi nke akụkụ omenala Hofstede isii (0-100 nke ọ bụla):
scoring.culturalDim1: Ike Anya: Ịdị n'usoro, nkwanye ùgwù maka ikike megide nha anya, olu nkịtị
scoring.culturalDim2: Ịdị n'otu n'otu vs. Ịhazi mkpokọta: Isi ihe 'M/M' lekwasịrị anya vs. Isi ihe 'Anyị/Anyị' lekwasịrị anya
scoring.culturalDim3: Ịbụ nwoke vs. Ịbụ nwanyị: Asụsụ asọmpi/nkwusi ike vs. asụsụ mmekorita/nkwekọrịta
scoring.culturalDim4: Izere Enweghị Ihe Ịma Aka: Iwu, nchekwa, nkọwa doro anya vs. imeghe ihe na-edoghị anya
scoring.culturalDim5: Nhazi Ogologo Oge: Nlekwasị anya n'ihe ga-abara uru n'ọdịnihu na uru dị mkpirikpi
scoring.culturalDim6: Nnụnụ na Njide: Olileanya/Ịtọ ụtọ megide asụsụ echekwara/a na-achịkwa
scoring.culturalRisk: Mgbe Akara Omenala dara n'okpuru 50, a na-etinye ụkpụrụ 'Ihe Ize Ndụ Aha' iji chebe akara gị n'ofe ndị na-ege ntị n'ụwa niile.
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Ozi ọ bụla na-amalite site na Akara Ziri Ezi nke 100. A na-ewepụ isi ihe maka nsogbu ndị achọtara:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Ezigbo Ezughi Ezu/Ozi Na-ezighi Ezi (-40 pts): Nkwupụta ụgha, data e chepụtara echepụta
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Isi mmalite na-abụghị nke a pụrụ ịtụkwasị obi (-20 pts): Mkpesa sitere na isi mmalite ndị a na-apụghị ịtụkwasị obi
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Nkwupụta A Na-apụghị Ịchọpụta (-10 pts): Nkwupụta ndị a na-apụghị inyocha eziokwu ha
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Ihe atụ: Nkwupụta ụgha (-40) + Isi mmalite a na-anaghị enyocha (-20) = Akara ikpeazụ nke 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Ọtụtụ nsogbu - a na-etinye ntaramahụhụ ọ bụla n'otu n'otu
scoring.flagStatusDesc: A na-egosi ọdịnaya na akpaghị aka dabere na nsonaazụ nyocha:
scoring.flag1: Mkpuchi Dị Mma (Akwụkwọ Ndụ): Akara karịrị 80 - dị njikere ibipụta
scoring.flag2: Achọrọ Nlebara Anya (Odo odo): Akara 60-79 - a na-atụ aro obere mmezi
scoring.flag3: E tinyere akara maka nyocha (Oranji): Akara 40-59 - a chọrọ nyocha tupu ebipụta ya
scoring.flag4: Nsogbu Ndị Dị Mkpa (Uhie): Akara ndị dị n'okpuru 40 - ebipụtala ruo mgbe edoziri ha
scoring.disclosureDesc: Maka ọdịnaya nkwalite, sistemụ ahụ na-enyochakwa:
scoring.disclosure1: Ọ bụ nkwalite: Na-achọpụta ma ọdịnaya ọ bụ mgbasa ozi ma ọ bụ nkwado
scoring.disclosure2: Nwere Nkpughe: Nyocha maka #ad, #nkwado, ma ọ bụ mkpughe mmekọrịta kwesịrị ekwesị
scoring.disclosure3: Nrubeisi Mpaghara: Na-enyocha ihe achọrọ maka mkpughe FTC (US), EU, na Norway
scoring.disclosure4: Mkpughe efu na-ebute mmebi dị elu (-25 isi) na akara Nrubeisi
scoring.tip: A na-agbakọ akara ọzọ oge ọ bụla a tụlere ọdịnaya. Jiri atụmatụ Rewrite mee ka ọdịnaya na-adịghị mma ka mma ma na-echekwa ozi gị.

analyze.intro: Usoro ọrụ Nyochaa Ọdịnaya na-enyere gị aka inyocha ọdịnaya dị ugbu a maka nnabata, mmetụta omenala, na ịdị mma tupu ebipụta ya.
analyze.stepsDesc: Soro usoro ndị a iji nyochaa ọdịnaya gị:
analyze.step1: Gaa na Ọgụgụ Isi Ọdịnaya > Nyochaa taabụ Ọdịnaya
analyze.step2: Mado ma ọ bụ pịnye ọdịnaya gị n'ebe ederede ahụ
analyze.step3: Họrọ Profaịlụ Atụmatụ iji tinye ntuziaka akara gị n'ọrụ
analyze.step4: Ma ọ bụrụ na ịchọrọ ka AI mepụta ihe onyonyo, họrọ 'Meete associating image'.
analyze.step5: Pịa 'Nyochaa' iji mee nyocha zuru oke
analyze.type1: Nyocha Nrubeisi: Na-enyocha ọdịnaya dabere na amụma na ụkpụrụ ikpo okwu (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Mmetụta Omenala: Nyocha maka ọdịnaya nwere ike ịkpasu iwe ma ọ bụ nke na-adịghị emetụta omenala
analyze.type3: Nkwenye Izi ezi: Na-enyocha nkwupụta na eziokwu maka izi ezi
analyze.type4: Nhazi Akara: Na-atụnyere ọdịnaya na ntuziaka Profaịlụ Atụmatụ gị
analyze.tip: Jiri bọtịnụ 'Degharịa' iji melite ọdịnaya nke na-erughị 70 na akpaghị aka. AI ga-edozi nsogbu ndị e depụtara ma na-edobe ozi gị.

generate.intro: Usoro ọrụ nke Mepụta ọdịnaya na-eji AI emepụta ọdịnaya ọhụrụ dabere na isiokwu gị, ihe achọrọ na ikpo okwu, na ntuziaka akara.
generate.step1: Gaa na taabụ Ọgụgụ Isi > Ọdịnaya Mmepụta
generate.step2: Tinye isiokwu gị ma ọ bụ kọwaa ihe ịchọrọ ịmepụta
generate.step3: Họrọ ikpo okwu ebumnuche gị na ụda ide ihe
generate.step4: Họrọ Profaịlụ Atụmatụ maka ịdị n'otu nke akara
generate.step5: Pịa 'Mepụta' iji mepụta ọdịnaya nke AI na-akwado
generate.optionsDesc: Hazie ọdịnaya gị mepụtara site na iji nhọrọ ndị a:
generate.option1: Nhọrọ Ikpo Okwu: Họrọ otu ma ọ bụ ọtụtụ ikpo okwu (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Olu Ide Ihe: Họrọ site na Ọkachamara, Nkịtị, Mkpali, ma ọ bụ Ihe Ọmụma
generate.option3: Ogologo Ọdịnaya: Hazie ogologo ebumnuche maka ọdịnaya gị
generate.option4: Mmepụta Foto: Gbanye iji mepụta onyonyo nke AI mepụtara na-eso ya
generate.tip: A na-enyocha ọdịnaya emepụtara na akpaghị aka mgbe e mechara ya. Lelee akara ndị ahụ ma jiri bọtịnụ nzaghachi mee ka ọ dịghachi ọhụrụ ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa.

schedulePrompt.intro: Usoro Nhazi na-enye gị ohere ịtọlite mmepụta ọdịnaya akpaaka nke na-arụ ọrụ n'oge akọwapụtara, na-eme ka kalenda ọdịnaya gị jupụta na-enweghị ntinye aka.
schedulePrompt.howToTitle: Ịtọlite Mkpalite Ndị E Mere Eme
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Mepụta ihe mkpali nke na-emepụta ọdịnaya na akpaghị aka:
schedulePrompt.step1: Mepụta ntuziaka mmepụta ọdịnaya gị site na isiokwu na mmasị
schedulePrompt.step2: Tọọ usoro ihe omume ugboro ole (kwa ụbọchị, kwa izu, ma ọ bụ ụbọchị akọwapụtara)
schedulePrompt.step4: Mee ka 'nyocha onwe' rụọ ọrụ nyocha na ọdịnaya emepụtara na akpaghị aka
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Nọgide na-ede akwụkwọ mgbe niile n'enweghị ọrụ aka kwa ụbọchị
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Mepụta ọdịnaya n'oge awa okike kacha mma
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Wulite ebe nchekwa ọdịnaya maka nyocha na nkwenye
schedulePrompt.tip: Ntuziaka ndị e mere atụmatụ na-emepụta ọdịnaya na draft gị. Nyochaa ma kwado tupu ebipụta ya iji hụ na ọ dị mma.

schedulePost.intro: Usoro Ozi na-enye gị ohere ịhazi ọdịnaya akwadoro maka mbipụta akpaka n'oge kachasị mma na nyiwe mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta gị ejikọtara.
schedulePost.step1: Site na nlele ọdịnaya ọ bụla, pịa 'Nhazi oge' kama 'Bipụta Ugbu a'
schedulePost.step2: Họrọ ụbọchị na oge ebumnuche gị maka mbipụta
schedulePost.step3: Họrọ nyiwe mmekọrịta ndị ejikọtara iji bipụta na ha
schedulePost.step4: Kwenye ma tinye na ndepụta oge gị
schedulePost.option1: Oge a kapịrị ọnụ: Họrọ ụbọchị na oge kpọmkwem maka mbipụta
schedulePost.option2: Oge kacha mma: Ka AI tụọ aro oge kacha mma maka izipu ozi dabere na data njikọ aka
schedulePost.option3: Ọtụtụ Ikpo Okwu: Hazie otu ọdịnaya ahụ n'ofe ọtụtụ ikpo okwu n'otu oge
schedulePost.warning: Ozi ndị e doziri aha chọrọ opekata mpe otu akaụntụ mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta ejikọtara. Jikọọ akaụntụ na Ntọala > Profaịlụ Mmekọrịta.

approval.intro: Usoro ọrụ nkwado na-eme ka ọdịnaya dị mma site na ịchọ nyocha nke onye njikwa tupu ebipụta ya. Nke a dị oke mkpa maka ndị otu ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị a na-achịkwa.
approval.processDesc: Otu ọdịnaya si aga n'usoro nkwado:
approval.step1: Onye Okike na-eziga ọdịnaya site na ịpị 'Nyefee maka Nkwenye'
approval.step2: Ọdịnaya pụtara na ndepụta nkwado nke onye njikwa
approval.step3: Onye njikwa na-enyocha ọdịnaya, akara, na nsonaazụ nyocha
approval.step4: Onye njikwa kwadoro, rịọ maka mgbanwe, ma ọ bụ jụ ọdịnaya ahụ
approval.status1: Edemede: A na-arụ ọrụ na ọdịnaya, a ka ebubatabeghị ya
approval.status2: Nkwenye Na-echere: E zigara ma na-eche nyocha onye njikwa
approval.status3: Akwadoro: Dị njikere ibipụta ma ọ bụ hazie oge maka mbipụta
approval.status4: Ndozigharị Mkpa: Onye njikwa rịọrọ mgbanwe - lelee nzaghachi wee zigaghachi
approval.tip: Tinye ihe ndetu mgbe ị na-enyefe ọdịnaya iji nye ndị nyocha ihe ọmụma gbasara mkpebi okike gị. Nke a na-eme ka usoro nkwenye dị ngwa.

gdpr.weValuePrivacy: Anyị Ji Nzuzo Gị Kpọrọ Ihe
gdpr.cookieDescription: Anyị na-eji kuki eme ka ahụmịhe nchọgharị gị ka mma, na-eje ozi ọdịnaya ahaziri iche, ma na-enyocha okporo ụzọ anyị. Site na ịpị "Nabata Ihe Niile", ị kwenyere na ojiji kuki anyị. Ị nwere ike hazie mmasị gị ma ọ bụ jụ kuki ndị na-adịghị mkpa.
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Achọrọ maka nyocha, nchekwa, na ọrụ ndị bụ isi. Enweghị ike ịgbanyụ ya.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Nyere anyị aka ịghọta otu ndị ọbịa si emekọrịta ihe na ikpo okwu anyị iji melite ọrụ anyị.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: A na-eji ya ezipụ mgbasa ozi nkeonwe ma tụọ irè mkpọsa.
